__localization_note: Official ordinances from Zamboanga City Sangguniang Panlungsod extracted from zamboangacity.gov.ph. Data includes appropriation ordinances (annual budgets, supplemental budgets, plantilla), regulatory ordinances (healthcare, education, legal services), and revenue ordinances (taxes, fees, permits). Last updated: January 2026.
